data.title: LISTEN, LISTEN
data.meta_description: Boston: Houghton Mifflin Company, 1981. Octavo, cloth. First edition. Collects four novellas and a speech. Includes The Winter Beach and With Thimbles, with Forks and Hope, two of Wilhelm's best shorter works. Locus nominee for Best Single Author Collection. See Anatomy of Wonder 1995 4-494. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. #169379
data.text:
Wilhelm, Kate. LISTEN, LISTEN. Boston: Houghton Mifflin Company, 1981. Octavo, cloth. First edition. Collects four novellas and a speech. Includes "The Winter Beach" and "With Thimbles, with Forks and Hope," two of Wilhelm's best shorter works. Locus nominee for Best Single Author Collection. See Anatomy of Wonder (1995) 4-494. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. (#169379).

Price: $100.00
